title: Join Study Groups
description: Create study groups for specific subjects, courses, or topics. Join existing study groups to collaborate with peers who share your academic interests.

title: Live Video Sessions
description: Host live video study sessions within your study groups for real-time collaboration. Use video conferencing to interact face-to-face, ask questions, and work through problems together.

title: Shared File & Resources
description: Upload and share documents, presentations, and study materials with your study group members. Collaborate on projects, review notes, and provide feedback effortlessly.

title: Discussion Boards and Forums
description: Engage in discussions with fellow students on dedicated discussion boards and forums. Ask questions, share insights, and exchange study tips and resources to enhance your learning experience.

title: Event Calendar and Reminders
description: Stay organized with an integrated event calendar. Keep track of upcoming study sessions, group meetings, and assignment deadlines. Set reminders to ensure you never miss an important study session or deadline.

title: Messaging & Communication
description: Communicate with your study group members through built-in messaging features. Send direct messages, create group chats, and stay connected with your peers whenever you need assistance or support.

title: File Storage and Sharing
description: Store and access study materials, notes, and resources securely within the platform. Share files with your study group members for seamless collaboration and information exchange.

title: Task Management
description: Create and assign tasks within your study groups to delegate responsibilities and track progress. Set deadlines, prioritize tasks, and monitor completion status to ensure productivity and accountability.

title: Customizable User Profiles
description: Customize your user profile with personal information, academic interests, and study preferences. Connect with like-minded students, find study groups, and build a network of peers to support your academic journey.
